replies.body: Yeah, I had to do this today too and it was suuuper slow. I'll check around and see if we've got any plans to streamline the process.
You know I thought your name was Riot Salad for a second.
Salaaaaaaad
https://i.pinimg.com/originals/91/d0/ec/91d0ece31d8e331bb1e862499b0efce0.jpg
*In front of my (Riot) Salad*
it is to me from now on
Riot Khaled: All he does is win.
That would be wonderful. Because by the time I had actually finished forging them all I had found a total of 5 games.
Just imagine what it was like for me. I did 40 until i realiized that i could just buy a token instead

Good deal, thanks for looking into this.

And nice playing with you earlier, I was the Unsealed Spellbook top lane Ashe when you were playing Orianna. Good seeing you on the Boards! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
That game was legitimately hilarious. Thanks for keeping a cool head and leading us to victory!
While you're at it, can we have an option to nuke all of our champion shards with one button? I'd really rather not do these one at a time.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Calad,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=B1uF7Hwz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-06T01:13:06.046+0000)
>
> Yeah, I had to do this today too and it was suuuper slow. I'll check around and see if we've got any plans to streamline the process.

DO IT!!!!

All caps aside, that is a QoL feature we really need.

even if it's not this event, just streamlining it for future events would be nice.

Also if like say you craft a skin or or two from an event then you have enough essence for 2 key shards or a champ orb and you opt for the key shards since you own all the champions or something like that. Then it would be nice to craft both at once.

Here's a thought, make the total amount of tokens received from the missions add up to a decent reward so we don't have these scrap left overs?  You know, instead of pretending that/making it look like the highest reward is available by completing the missions.  Just attach an RP value to the big reward instead of hiding that.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Calad,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=B1uF7Hwz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-06T01:13:06.046+0000)
>
> Yeah, I had to do this today too and it was suuuper slow. I'll check around and see if we've got any plans to streamline the process.

for ALL the token quests please. The worlds one were painful to do as well, since I was just barely short of one of the bigger prizes.

A suggestion:

An up/down or +/- that indicates the number of tokens you want into that prize, with the maximum equalling the total number you can convert with all the currency you have. Like what we had for runes last time, the +/- from 0 to 9.

I think a simple system where you can 'lock' certain shards, and then disenchant all 'unlocked' shards button would be effective. Allows for a 'disenchant all' option, while preserving those couple shards you want to keep safe.
is it possible to make an undo feature for the tokens?
I love how all Boards can complain about something but the issue is looked at only when a Rioter experienced this

I think  it's funny that the sentence you made every word seperate comes to a total of 16 words, just like the 16 blue essence you need.

GJ fam.

Why aren't you getting the key fragment?

You're only supposed to disenchant 4.

It's easier.

And it's worth more anyway.

Because I get a steady flow of key fragments and the amount of chests I get due to my relatively small amount of champs I enjoy playing isn't extensive.

So why would I get extra key fragments I wouldn't likely use up anyway?
Fair enough.  One would get the key fragment because they are worth more and chest are abundant and easy to get.  If you don't capitalize on those chests, that's your choice which is fine.

Sorry I don't feel like getting that 120 OE from the potential legendary skin you get from the chest lined with emotes, wards, and icons worth even less.

Maybe if chests were worth more than me being bored playing another champ than the ones I prefer to play I'd give it more of a thought.
Your telling me. I have like 8-10 keys on my two accounts and no boxes. I want a reset so I can earn them again.
Just enter a twisted treeline queue. They will be done in no time!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Why was this so funny lool

Good guy Calad. By the way, is there any reason that it's such an arbitrary number like 16? Why couldn't it be 32? Then we'd at least have enough left over to grab a project champion orb as well as the hunter borders and icon. Since I don't have those skins, I really just bought the icon... I probably will buy project vayne or something eventually just for that reason, but still.

You can Enable Low Spec mode to speed up the process.

Sorry you had to go through it the slow way already, though.

xD
16? Try having 32... shit is painful. Not to mention you gotta sit there for every animation of the damn thing spinning like some magical pinwheel.
16 words in that sentence , wp lol
You could've bought 2 skin orbs but ok
